text:
Heat and Despair

A sweltering street, a man in turmoil.  
His thoughts spiral in dread.  
Man: “Only to get it over!”  
Man: “This heat is unbearable!”  
Man: “What if they question me?”

---

A police station looms ahead, anxiety builds.  
His heart races as he approaches.  
Man: “I’ll confess everything…”  
Man: “Just breathe, just breathe.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist is overwhelmed by despair and trepidation as he approaches the police station, contemplating confession.
